metadata.name: Ava's Tranquility
metadata.description:
Through the delicate strokes of pencil and charcoal, I aimed to capture the essence of calmness and inner stillness ,inviting viewers into a world of peace and tranquility.

This artwork celebrates Ava's tranquility, as she embodies a sense of serenity and peacefulness. Her serene gaze and graceful features create a captivating presence, drawing the viewer into a moment of tranquility and introspection.

Physical size : 70x50 CM
Scanned size : 7533x5834 pixels
Collection : Elegant Strength
